post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Q. We're looking for a developer as you know. Tell me about your experience at the project 'XX'.
A. In fact, I worked mostly doing administrator work at then with approximately 30% of development.
** It looks hardly going to happen, but it does sometimes. You don't need to be too honest to make them put you out of the race too early. Impress by talking about what you've done and what you can do for them.
post.title: How to fail a job interview (5) job relevance
